title: SME Competency Enhancement Course for Corporate Distance Education Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of corporate training development processes
context.additional_context: A program for practicing professionals to cultivate corporate remote training development skills using synchronous online education and rapid e-learning techniques.

learning_goals: Learners can plan and develop rapid e-learning modules within two weeks as a Subject Matter Expert (SME)
Learners can utilize VR simulation tools to facilitate effective workshops in synchronous online environments
Learners can design and implement real-world corporate training scenarios through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
